task.title: How to start the Ice Cream Machine

step.cmd: Take out the freezer bowl from the freezer.
Put freezer bowl into the center of the base.

substep.cmd: The bowl will defrost immediately after removing from freezer, use quickly.

step.cmd: Rest mixing arm in freezer bowl, it should not be tight, the circle side facing up.
Place the Easy Lock lid on the base.

substep.cmd: Oriented to the right of center.

step.cmd: Plug in the baseâ€™s power cord and the machine will be ready.
